671e1fcd-a96c-4feb-9ece-5b00ca9548e9.name: Death from Extra Effort results in nuclear meltdown

5ba363e0-82aa-4a6f-bb18-27e91318829f.name: Directional
5ba363e0-82aa-4a6f-bb18-27e91318829f.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

60b67c07-3682-4332-ab31-1c6a64844587.notes: Whenever someone scores a hit on your vitals, even if it does no damage, you fall unconscious.
60b67c07-3682-4332-ab31-1c6a64844587.name: Exposed Power Switch (Large)

46d34cef-963f-4361-8a9c-ab068169799f.notes: Whenever someone scores a critical hit against you in melee combat, you fall unconscious.
46d34cef-963f-4361-8a9c-ab068169799f.name: Exposed Power Switch (Small)

e51c06e7-bee2-42a1-958c-6b41e23e8590.name: Combat Reflexes
e51c06e7-bee2-42a1-958c-6b41e23e8590.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

94bdbbc7-7fed-4a38-b10d-998f67a03ab0.name: Talent (Reality Comprehension)
94bdbbc7-7fed-4a38-b10d-998f67a03ab0.notes: Adds to IQ rolls and IQ-based skill rolls made to interpret Sense rolls.

e607f674-c8bc-4b16-ad9e-f67a83736dce.name: Extra-Flexible Arm
e607f674-c8bc-4b16-ad9e-f67a83736dce.notes: One of your first two arms.

a0998ac8-1963-43c5-a22b-4c7032b5d70f.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose
a0998ac8-1963-43c5-a22b-4c7032b5d70f.name: Frequency: Monthly

ab6aa9ac-17f8-462e-8d97-6d5523b6c943.name: Frequency: Daily
ab6aa9ac-17f8-462e-8d97-6d5523b6c943.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

6638aa1d-a443-4f57-be64-4f096c79af9c.name: Frequency: Seasonally
6638aa1d-a443-4f57-be64-4f096c79af9c.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

2a6d9b03-a9a3-481b-a8db-24d5a029cedb.name: Frequency: Hourly
2a6d9b03-a9a3-481b-a8db-24d5a029cedb.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

0e3c0051-a416-4549-ae03-9379e10775e9.name: Frequency: Yearly
0e3c0051-a416-4549-ae03-9379e10775e9.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

690d6a14-69a3-4c1c-b98c-0adffc9aafc9.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it
690d6a14-69a3-4c1c-b98c-0adffc9aafc9.name: Frequency: Constantly

e786684d-b4f2-4a0f-90a6-19c187a393ad.name: Aging
e786684d-b4f2-4a0f-90a6-19c187a393ad.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

b000af04-f1de-4561-9171-53048246ef73.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose
b000af04-f1de-4561-9171-53048246ef73.name: Frequency: Weekly

5baf5415-7955-4124-8538-4e46a4ede50c.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@
5baf5415-7955-4124-8538-4e46a4ede50c.name: Directional

cc95f9a8-ac6e-4ae1-b85e-78091b01afa0.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
cc95f9a8-ac6e-4ae1-b85e-78091b01afa0.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

bf0cc95c-267c-422f-8d92-f4d3f0ae49f5.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
bf0cc95c-267c-422f-8d92-f4d3f0ae49f5.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

6f1919c9-33d1-4599-86de-14278fe93c6b.name: Loose Circuitry
6f1919c9-33d1-4599-86de-14278fe93c6b.notes: Any time you take damage, roll HT to stay conscious.
